body: At 3rd level, an arctic druid suffers no penalty to speed or on Acrobatics, Climb, or Stealth checks in snowy or icy terrain or weather conditions and can walk across snow crusts or thin ice without breaking through. This ability replaces trackless step.
name: Icewalking
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Arctic Druid/Icewalking
